Name: Fragment of a djed-pillar
Description: Fragment of the upper part of a djed-pillar with representations of djed-pillars in low relief on all four sides. Only the upper section is visible. On two adjacent sides, the djed-pillars are crowned by ram's horns, sun disc, uraei and double feathers; on the other two sides are two Ba-birds with solar discs on their heads and facing the same direction. In front of their feet are two rearing uraei. Behind the Ba-birds, in the upper right corner, is a short column of inscription.
